name: The Google Adwords Happening
description: On April 11, 2002, I launched a 24h-happening on Google Adwords, which was censored by Google's performance monitoring bot because my Click-Through Rate was too low. Realizing that language had become a monetary unit, I wrote this text about "Semantic Capitalism", where the most expensive word is "free". As a by-product of this censorship, I became an artist in less than 24 hours and the "Google Adwords Happening" was then exhibited all over the world. About twenty years later, we have finally shifted from the golden age of net.art and the indefinitely reproducible ready-made to the ultimate semiotic market of NFTs and the death of equivocation. / ArcheoNFT - Printable 15x35cm - The webpage is available at iterature.com/adwords.
